class.name: SensorLevels
class.rosDesc:
byte RECONFIGURE_CLOSE = 3 # Parameters that need a sensor to be stopped completely when changed
byte RECONFIGURE_STOP = 1 # Parameters that need a sensor to stop streaming when changed
byte RECONFIGURE_RUNNING = 0 # Parameters that can be changed while a sensor is streaming

constant.name: RECONFIGURE_CLOSE
constant.comment: Parameters that need a sensor to be stopped completely when changed

constant.name: RECONFIGURE_STOP
constant.comment: Parameters that need a sensor to stop streaming when changed

constant.name: RECONFIGURE_RUNNING
constant.comment: Parameters that can be changed while a sensor is streaming
